entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 15 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 05 January 2023
